Paragraphs: v4 Hi, I'm Matthew, a self-starting Software Professional capable of designing and delivering functional products and coaching teams to improve processes, follow best practices and develop a DevSecOps mindset.

I understand that people are at the heart of any organisation and I try to base my principles off this - products should meet the needs of the users, be cost-effective budget holders, and be written such that the code is easy for the development team to work with.
Outside of work I enjoy playing hockey, countryside walks, and giving back to the community.
